Class Effect.Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.Effect.Animation
  • Enclosing class:
    Effect

    public static class Effect.Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    A small helper class for creating and managing complex custom-type effects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Effect.Animation.Frame
      Stores an frame's RGBW color and transition time.
